name: Puta Mili
overview: Along the XX century, there was in Spain, a compulsory military service known as "Mili". This period in the army hid, most of time, cheap workforce (free actually) and a military training limited to teach the use of such a lethal weapons as broom and mop, how to hide from the incompetent officers and psychopathics veterans and fight against getting into the abuse of drugs and booze. The brilliant cartoonist Ivà put to paper the absurd situations happened during this "Mili" in his serial comic "Historias de la puta mili" ("Fucking Mili Stories") published weekly in the satirical magazine "El Jueves".
